text:
My 3 experiences here have left me just "okay" at best. I certainly would not recommend sitting inside, under any circumstances. There's a bar, pool table, and benches, but the entire restaurant smells like smoke (and trash), so sit outside.

Which leads me to the good part. They have a nice outdoor deck, right next to the water, plenty of trees, so for sitting somewhere outside during good weather, this place is perfect for just kicking back a few brewskies and chatting with friends outside.

Calzones are too expensive, but they are good and you can totally share one with your wife.

They do have music outside/inside a few times a week, usually a 1 person guitar act.

text:
Walked in for the first time today. I came in with my husband, he and the associate talked about products for a while and my husband's time in the Marines came up. I let them talk for a while and browsed around, figuring my husband was getting the help he needed.

When they broke so that we could browse, the associate asked if I was also in the military and I said no. To this he said "Oh, so you let him do all the hard work?" What am I supposed to take from this? Does he think I have it so easy? This was just such a rude and presumptuous thing to say. I was so ticked I wanted to leave right away.

UPDATED:
The owner has been very understanding about the event and I'm glad he reached out to me to try to make things right. I really do appreciate his efforts and I've updated my rating to reflect this.

name: Ben Brenner
text:
I really wanted to like Benjamin's.  The menu and especially the burgers are inventive and intriguing, the location is great for us mid-towners, and the building has a special charm to it.  As stated elsewhere, the service is not professional.  At brunch recently, we waited 20 minutes before we saw a waiter.  We waited another 10 minutes after we were finished eating before we were able to get our check.  The staff are all friendly enough, just don't seem to know how to properly wait on tables.

The Food....    Best thing on the menu I've tried is the burgers... but there are cheaper better burgers elsewhere in midtown.  I suppose it is the only place you can get a burger sandwiched between two donuts, but then again, why would you want a burger sandwiched between two donuts?  The Red Beans and Rice (even though it was recommended) was the worst red beans and rice I've ever had. It completely lacked in flavor.  Recently, at brunch, their complementary beignets, were gooey and and not cooked well.  I tried their fries with shredded chicken wings and cheese... it was ok but am not a fan of their wing sauce.  Then I had their special of the day, a breakfast bowl.  I should have known from the description, it wasn't going to be good. It completely lacked in flavor. My partner in crime ordered the meatloaf cupcakes and was served a grayish brown pile of mushy meatloaf and spuds with gravy.  Kind of disgusting and no flavor.  Also disappointing was the quality of coffee and their bloody marys which didn't have a good flavor or bite.

They have a decent beer selection but their craft beers are $6 and up a pint. Kind of rich for my taste.

All in all, I really hope they are able to get things fixed. I think in trying to find their niche, they've focussed more on an inventive menu than quality food. I'll stick to the restaurants with quality and flavor than wacky combinations.

text: Fantastic place.

name: j m
text: Attended the Avatar concert here. I read previous reviews and didn't know what to expect. I have to say my experience was great. The waitress Alley, was excellent. She was very friendly and my wife and I never had to ask for anything because she checked on us a lot. The staff that I had contact with was nice as well. Enjoyed the venue very much and will gladly drive 2 hours again to see another show here.

name: J A
text: Terrible service.  We had a large party of about 8-10 the place was pretty empty but the host said that a lot of the tables were full so we went to the bar to wait for the rest of our party and grab drinks while she figured it out. The host sat back down and didn't get us a table we had to go get her and tell her again.  Then once we were seated they made the bartender that was serving us at the bar come out from behind the bar to our table to be our server when they had multiple servers available.  It took us an hour to get our food and one of our guest burger was burnt. The atmosphere was good though and the bartender was awesome she did such a great job even though the place is ran poorly.  I would recommend it as a bar but if you want food and service I recommend going elsewhere.

Someone that PAYS their hard earned money to come in and eat with their children I was instantly disgusted. Then I get back to work and find that my food was undercooked (still bleeding) when I asked for well done. The gentleman that was the manager condoned her remarks as she is just young. Well sir my young children come in there to eat and I am utterly applaud that you stand behind her remarks. I will never spend my money at this restaurant simply because of the manager and the way he handled this situation. So I missed my lunch and had to do without. THANK YOU! Word of mouth is the best compliment, to bad you left me with only negativity.

name: Sam Shorrosh
text: Love the personal visits by the owner who always takes a minute to talk table side. The food is always piping hot and the drinks ice cold. Lots of TVs all around to entertain and the wait staff are helpful without hovering.

name: Cindy Golliher
text: Best wings I have ever had!! Great atmosphere.  Great service. I will definitely stop here the next time I'm in town!

name: Nik Gribb
text: Absolutely the worst service. We decided to go there for some Southern Style food and came away disgusted.  We ordered the fried green tomatoes as an appetizer, got them AFTER our main course was eaten.  Server continually blamed the kitchen staff for the half and hour wait.  The restaurant wasn't even packed.  We ordered corn dogs for the kids, yup half and hour wait.  Server completely forgot the diet coke and screwed up the chicken order.  We asked for legs and thighs, got beast and wing. Argggh.

text: I love this place their wings and loaded fries are the bomb. We also watch the games on one of the many different TV screens they have throughout the place. Great place for sport fans to gather.

name: Shawn Dunne
text: Really good food. I had the jerk wings! Drinks were fine. Beer selection was lacking in the darker Porter style range. The big projectors didn't have great color or clear pictures in the bar area. Overall the pretty decent place.

name: nate J. pooh
text: At the start the service was questionable. We're getting seated and the first table she wanted to seat us at was directly in front on entry way of kitchen. Second spot  was directly next to a couple. Mind you the place was very unpacked maybe 10 guest at best 5 of 10 were at the bar when we got there. The table  had not been wiped clean. The whole area had not been clean since whoever left. It was so slow that the associates were  just standing around talking . The bathroom  looked like a club bathroom on a Saturday night at 2am. Floors were very sticky for some reason. Like when you go to a club and its really hot  and people have wasted alcohol and it's been trampled on. NOW the food was good but the chicken strips and 2 sides was very over price at $13! Three strips fries  and a small  dish  salad. Strips and fries were good tho. I got the Nashville Hot Chicken with two sides.  That was a whole chicken breast and wing for $10 and change. It was very good. Now our waitress was a different story. She was unenthusiastic and very dry. We had completely  ate our food but she had the nerve to ask if we wanted to-go boxes. Um... for the crumbles of curly fries ??? She also didn't check on us till after  we were 80% done eating.

name: Derek Jones
text: Cool venue with plenty of 📺 for whichever sport you prefer. The new Nashville got spice chicken menu is delicious!

text: I LOVE THIS PLACE!!!!! Been going here since I was younger and my favorite are the gooey fries and honey bbq wings! Fast service, good food, nice environment!

name: Michael
text: Meh....I walked in right to place a to-go order for a Nashville hot chicken platter as they were opening for the day. I was told that they didn't have any chicken halves so I had to get the tenders. I took a seat at the end of the bar to wait on my food. The bartender (a very petite brunette) never acknowledged my presence. I would have had a cold beer while I waited to no avail, she was too preoccupied with her cellphone which she had hooked up charging next to the register. (Who shows up for work at 11am and has to charge their phone?) I suppose I may return one day due to the chicken being pretty good but that bartender should understand her personal phone takes a back seat to anyone who sits at the bar. I'm sure she saw me it would have been impossible to miss me. Everyone else was fairly pleasent. Took off 2 stars for not having what I wanted and the unattentive bar keep on duty that day.

Again, we went there strictly for the karaoke and aside from the drunks (who were simply drunk, not angry or violent) itt wasn't a bad experience. We just might go back.

text: I went with three friends to play pool.  My friends and I were taking turns buying rounds, so we ended up drinking around six shots each and I nursed a beer for around two hours.  I gave the bartender my debit card for us to get the setup to play pool and paid for my drinks with cash.  At the end of the night my friend was sick(drunk) and we were having to leave suddenly.  My tab was $55.00.  I went back and counted the shot glasses, beer bottles etc. and they added up to the amount of cash I spent. The bartender charged me twice for each drink and I'm sure she pocketed the money although I was tipping great.  I would advise not running your card at the Touchdown Tavern.  There are thieves behind the bar.

name: Zion Bethel
text:
GREAT GREAT GREAT!! A very unique two story bar experience with great food, a wide selection of alcoholic beverages, and an arcade for the books! The adult equivalent of Dave & Busters! The owner is usually on site and is extremely friendly and passionate about the place, and has plans to expand the arcade to include more activities.

Most games cost .50¢ or no more than $1.00, but the pool tables are free to play and the iceball roller game is as well.

All in all, if you're looking for a fresh and new bar experience that has many friendly faces, isn't too packed, doesn't kill conversation with loud music, and serves food that leaves nothing to be desired, this is the place for you and your friends!

Come grab a drink and play some classic arcade games!

Not to mention, had to wait a long time for mediocre drinks.

resp.text: Sofia, I would like to apologize for how we made you feel. That said, the security team deals with and see a lot when it comes to checking for real and fake ID's. Thank you for the opportunity to serve.

name: Steve Stanley
text: Enjoyed the lunch special at Jockers today.  Excellent curries.  I love their Indian dishes so I haven't tried the American dishes. Service was fast and courteous.  The atmosphere is great for a business meeting or dining with friends.

resp.text: Great choice of having authentic Indian dishes. We are open for lunch from 11am to 2pm and dinner from 4pm until 9pm and Friday/Saturday 10pm. Sunday 12-5pm. We have two cuisines American and Indian. We provide courteous, friendly and fast service in a relaxing atmosphere with quality, fresh and value for money meals. The restaurant offers signature drinks and cocktails.We cater for all types of guests- business , family, reunion, meetings, casual and groups. Thank you for your business.

name: Cynthia Payne
text: It was delicious and fast. Not very many customers so waitress was very attentive and knowledgeable of the menu except that I ordered a salad and they were not taking orders for salads.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Pleased you enjoyed your meal in a great atmosphere with fast and friendly service. All our staff are trained to know our menu items and explain to our valuable guests. Salads are presently not available.

name: Jay O
text: The food was outstanding, the service was on point. It was refreshing to eat a quality meal. The staff is great...always checking on ya...owner was exceptional...visited and made sure food was delicious.  Very clean.

resp.text: Awesome. Thank you for your five star rating. We strive for excellence with every dish served and guest. We ensure that our dishes are prepared freshly per order. Your are absolutely right about our employees- friendly, polite, attentive, helpful with every guest. We appreciate your business.

name: Visaboy M.
text: I only experienced their Philly Fries and some type of desert. Philly Fries were amazing. Not very expensive.

resp.text: Appreciate your review. Loaded Philly Fries are our signature dish. Very popular with our valuable guests. We offer variety of deserts that our guests order after have a delicious meal. Thank you for visiting our restaurant.

name: Hunter Waldman
text: My wife, a friend, and I went to try the Indian Cuisine at Jokers for Lunch today. It was excellent. I love Indian food and am a tough critic, but it was the best Indian I’ve ever had. Rick came out and talked with us (great guy) and we’ve been begging the Shoals area to get an Indian restaurant. Super pumped about this place and hoping to get them more visitors. If you are unsure of what to order, you cannot go wrong with Chicken Tika Massala. It’s a very “safe” first time order. Excellent food overall.

resp.text: Awesome! Thank you for your feedback. It was absolutely pleasure serving your party. Definitely Chicken Tikka Masala is favorite Indian cuisine around the world. Our chef cooks each meal per order, therefore, fresh quality ingredients and appetizing. We will extend our menu as business grows giving our valuable guests more choices to ensure we can meet their palate. We appreciate your loyalty.

name: Rikesh Patel
text:
Love the upscale feel and atmosphere with a great twist.

Their cocktails are great and the lighting is really cool around the bar area.

It is nice to know that there are different cuisine options in the Shoals.

Great draft beer options and entertainment. This will be a regular spot from now on.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your business. We offer Indian and American cuisine to suit every guests needs. We are pleased to do restaurant business in the Shoals area. Variety of cocktails, beer and music offered daily.

name: Sam Carpenter
text: Never been to a more funner place then this club. The bartender Jake gave me the best drinks and he was hilarious! He made my experience much more enjoyable we always take great care of him when we are there on saturdays. Every Saturday is a routine for me and the guys and this place has won me over

resp.text: We appreciate your loyalty to Jokers Bar and restaurant. We have variety of drinks and specialty cocktails. Jake is a wonderful bartender like rest of our team. He does create a great experience for our valuable guests. See you next Saturday. Thank you.

name: April De Luna
text: My husband and I went here to eat Indian food and that we did. We was so pleased with the waitress Bret is her name I believe. And the food was Awesome... We will absolutely be back time and time again. Thank you Chef Ram..

resp.text: Thank you for coming over to our Jokers restaurant. Absolutely our food is the finest in the area. Pleased you enjoyed your Indian dishes, which is very authentic. Your server Brett is very friendly, polite, helpful like rest of our valuable servers. We look forward to your next visit. We pass on your comments to Ram, chef.

name: Michelle Poston
text: We are from out of town visiting family, the butter chicken was good/ok. But, not much chicken, it was mostly sauce. Small portions of rice too.

resp.text: We appreciate you trying out our establishment for authentic Indian dishes. Our butter chicken is a very popular dish. Sorry you felt there was not enough chicken. We serve extra rice rice on request. We hope you visit us again and any concerns please let us know. Thank you for your business.

name: Beverly Emerson
text: Food Good and lots of space. Room outside and great dance

resp.text: Wonderful. Yes we have a great outdoor patio with a stage and 2 bars with plenty of seating facilities. Also there is enough space for people to enjoy the music and dance the night away! This all compliments our Indian/ American cuisine- great choices of freshly cooked dishes. Hope you enjoyed the band last night.

name: Melissa Littrell
text: First time at Jokers.  Food was great abd the music of Tremayne was awesome!  They need to be your house band!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Tremayne are an excellent band playing variety of popular songs. The crowd at Jokers had a great time listening and dancing to their music. As you mentioned we have awesome selection of food with American and Indian menu selections. We have live entertainment on Friday or Saturday check our Facebook page.

name: David Ellis
text: My wife and I love Indian cuisine, and this is excellent and authentic! We have had been searching for a place since the good one in Madison closed.

resp.text: Thank you for your visit to Jokers to eat our delicious Indian meal. We are glad to bring Indian cuisine to the Shoals. The menu consists variety of Indian delicacies. We appreciate your business.

name: Jake Miller
text: Great upscale atmosphere with the best bartenders in the 256! Owners and management are very friendly. Food is AWESOME. would highly recommend and would give 10 stars if it was a option!

resp.text: Wow… appreciate the valuable feedback. We have team of people from management to employees. They take care of each guest.

name: Larry Hardy
text: Great food and atmosphere definitely will go back. I recommend it to everyone. That have Indian and American food and both are amazing

resp.text: We look forward to your next visit to the Jokers serving both American and Indian cuisine. Our decor is very contemporary and unique. Thank you for your review.

name: Andy modi
text: Ordered Chicken Tikka 555 and it was an awesome experience. Joker reminded me of my good old days in India

resp.text: Wonderful! Chicken tikka 555 is a specialty dish created by our chef. It is a very popular dish. Pleased you enjoyed the Indian we have created with authentic Indian cuisine.

name: Brandy Massey
text: Something new & unique to the area with the Indian food! Good atmosphere & people that owns it! I do believe this business will last,and as a community we need to uplift these owners and employees so they will succeed! 😌😌

resp.text: Thank you for your support. Great food and ambiance. Yes we’re here to ensure we serve the community with delicious food with excellent service.

name: Tyler Foreman
text:
Both voodoo, and joker burgers are fantastic.
Fish & chips are bomb af.
Lamb Curry is everything.
Glad this place came to the shoals to bring some variety to the area.

resp.text: Wow wonderful you enjoyed variety of cuisine both American and Indian. Our burgers are specifically formulated for our restaurant. Fish and chip a great British tradition made fresh cod. Great with splash of malt vinegar. All our curries of great taste mainly chicken, lamb, fish or vegetables. Thank you for your business and hope to see soon.

name: Pace Forrest
text: Waitress was very nice and kept us taken care of. Food was well cooked and the building itself looks very nice.

resp.text: We have the finest team in the Shoals at Jokers. Our team are very friendly, polite and helpful with great service and food. Thank you for your business.

name: Garret Cox
text: Cool atmosphere, delicious food and drinks. On top of normal fare (burgers, etc) they have delicious indian cuisine! Try the chicken tikka masala and naan bread!

resp.text: Fabulous! Yes you are right Chicken Tikka Masala is a very popular authentic Indian dish made with creamy gravy with various spices. Our naan bread is cooked freshly in tandoor ( clay oven)- you can have plain, butter, garlic/butter or chilly naan, choice is yours. Our signature burger is Jokers Burger specially created by our chef. We appreciate your business. Thank you.

name: Austin Lee
text: I cant leave a biased opinion on the establishment. The reason i am biased is i really dont have the liking for indian food. But they do have other options. Worth the try if u do like the food

resp.text: Yes you are correct we have 2 cuisines- American and Indian cuisine. The choice is yours. Thank you for your feedback.

name: John Chase
text: I rounded up my family and came here for lunch today based on this web page and the sign out front showing that they should be open.  The place looked closed, no cars, and no one answered the phone.  I was disappointed.  But,  the manager called me later to explain they were open but he was in the back and had no customers yet so they looked closed.  I will try again soon and try the door even if they look closed!

resp.text: We are open today 11am to 9pm. Everyday we are open Tuesday to Thursday 11am to 9pm, Friday and Saturday close at 10pm . Sundays 12pm-6pm. Closed on Mondays. These are restaurant times. Hope to see you at these opening times. Our management spoke to you earlier. Thank you.

name: Ryan Swindle
text: Very nice new restaurant in our area. Lots of variety on the menu.

resp.text: Absolutely newest restaurant in the Shoals area. We cater for all authentic Indian and American cuisine in a great atmosphere. Thank you for your patronage.

name: Michelle White
text: Affordable and delicious. One of the best burgers I've ever had.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Our burgers are the best in the Shoals. We have our signature Jokers Burger - very popular with our guests. Great food at affordable prices.

name: ALEX P
text:
Exceeds Expectation!

Meat and veggies freshness and quality guaranteed, ingredients and spices adequate quantity, superb menu instructions and result, tasty and satisfying, excellent and prompt customer service!!!

resp.text: Excellent five stars rating! We appreciate your business. We serve both American and Indian cuisine at highest quality and freshness. We have many  of dishes choices for every consumer palate. All our team members provide finest service in the restaurant/ bar industry.

name: Martin Dean
text: We have Indian food in the Shoals! WOOHOO! it was very good, the Samosas were divine, Chicken Curry, off the chain. Go, expand your horizons!

resp.text: Yes we’re are glad to bring Indian cuisine to the Shoals. Glad we made your choice of palate. We offer variety of dishes.

name: Jacob Hodgson
text: I can't attest to the atmosphere, but the Lamb Vindaloo that I just got for lunch take-out is worth the five stars on its own.

resp.text: Great. Pleased that you enjoyed your lamb vindaloo- obviously you enjoy hot spicy dish. You should try our popular dish of chicken tikka Masala. Thank you for your your take-out order.

name: Deanna Jackson
text: Amazing food great service. We have been there many tine

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We sincerely appreciate your continued support by frequently coming to our Jokers restaurant/bar. We certainly have amazing food and great selection on our menu.

name: Timothy James
text: Nice place.  Great food and friendly staff.

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed your food and service at Jokers. We offer variety of American and Indian cuisine. Our staff are absolutely friendly and polite.

name: Allison Mackey
text: Went on a Friday night for dinner. We had cocktails, the vegetable samosas, veggie curry, chana masala (chickpeas), and gulab jamun. STELLAR food. Hopefully the service will improve (took a very very very long time to get our food.) Also looking forward to the full Indian menu availability. I appreciated that Indian music was playing as we ate. Super friendly staff. Will eat here again!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our Indian menu is very highly recommended by our valuable guests like yourself. We will be extending our menu in the near future. We apologize for delay in serving your meal. We cook fresh food, so it takes time to prepare and execute. Appreciate your business.

name: Terri Whalen
text: The food was awesome - veg samosas, chicken 555, shrimp pakora, saag paneer, chicken curry, - all excellent! Garlic nan was very flavorful.  The mixed drinks were exceptional.  The raita was a bit thin for my preference but had great flavor.  Rice was perfect. They are still working from a limited menu so looking forward to going back again to try some other dishes.  So happy to have Indian as a local option - it is one of our favorite cuisines and we always had to travel to get it.  (We did have a rather long wait time to get our food but I think that is reflective of a new venture...I’m sure they will work out the kinks with time.)  Definitely recommend for great Indian good.

resp.text: Fantastic 5 stars review. We offer variety of Indian cuisine. Pleased you enjoyed your dishes ordered. Thank you for your understanding of delay in food. Our naans are freshly made in tandoor. All our meals are made freshly, cooked to order. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit.

name: Timothy Whalen
text:
The food here is excellent. It's at least as good as any Indian food I've had in Nashville, Birmingham, or Huntsville. The chicken 555, vegetable samosas, and shrimp pelota we're tasty and well prepared. Saag Paneer, Chicken Curry, and Lamb Korma had delightful subtle flavors. The meats were succulent. Gulab Jamun was chewy on the outside creamy on the inside in a sweet but not cloying honey sauce.
The reason for only four stars is they are new so it took a long time for the food to come out, the servers didn't know the menu very well, and they seemed confused. Once they get their systems running more smoothly they'll be 5 starts for sure!

resp.text: Thank you for your visit to Jokers to try out our Indian cuisine. We serve variety of appetizers, entrees and desserts. Our meals are cooked fresh and takes time to delivery to your table. We look forward to your next visit.

name: Sonia Patek
text: Very friendly place. Love Indian food. Everything is extravaganza❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback. It was a pleasure serving you with authentic Indian cuisine. Pleased you enjoyed our friendly service, great atmosphere, delicious Indian food and ambiance.

name: Markesha Hackett
text: Go get you a Mother Clucker Chicken sandwich or fish and chips!!! Omg sooooo good!

resp.text: Yes it is gray choices of meals. Fish and Chips is very popular. Thank you for your feedback.

name: Kennedy English
text: Service is slow and management seems indifferent. Alcohol was served to obviously patrons that were clearly to inebriated to drink more.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Our food is cooked fresh therefore may take slightly longer to deliver to your table. Very confusing about management comment, we get compliments on our management interaction with our valuable guests. Every individual has there own tolerance on consumption of alcohol, we do not control people’s habits!

name: Keith Cantrell
text: Great food, great atmosphere, nice service! Gotta check out the live music!

resp.text: Wonderful. Thank you for your review. Glad you enjoyed your visit to our bar and restaurant. Check out our Facebook for live entertainment weekly.

name: Sherri Casinger
text: Food was great loved the atmosphere of the place and great service

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Excellent that you enjoyed your meal. Our facility offers great ambiance in a contemporary surroundings. We have very friendly, polite and helpful team members to serve you. Appreciate you coming to our restaurant/ bar.

name: Ron Almy
text: Although , not opened(opening is scheduled for March 15 )it'll contain a sports themed atmosphere, several bars and a family friendly restaurant with quality foods and an authentic        Indian style menu.

resp.text: We are open now with American and Indian restaurant with great cocktails, beer and music. Come and check us out.

name: Tamera Johnson
text: The music could have been better

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Let us know on your next visit- suggestions on music of choice.

name: Jackson Lane
text: I am the kitchen manager so I'm a little biased. I think were good.

resp.text: We are the best!

name: Benjamin Reed
text: This is a great place for the Shoals Area.

resp.text: Absolutely we are here for longevity in the Shoals area.

name: Trish Haynes
text: Food made all of my friends sick. Staff/drinks  were awful. Got thrown up on when walking to bar area.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about your visit. Usually food incidents occur after 24 hours of consumption. Hope you guys are doing well.

name: Heber Melendez
text: Had a great time there

resp.text: Thank you for visiting us at Jokers of the Shoals. Glad you enjoyed your time at our restaurant/ bar. Thanks for your five star review.

name: Shane Lee
text: Great service and the food was good

resp.text: Excellent. Appreciate you coming to Jokers for friendly and courteous service. We have both American and Indian menu. Thank you.

name: Callie Perry
text: Lots of good music and dancers

resp.text: We provide fabulous music and definitely food. Try out our menu for choice of Indian or American dishes.

name: Tj Keller
text: Uh I’m confused 8$ brownie and it took 8 hrs and the owner had the audacity to tell me to have a nice day after that nope

name: Marcus Jones
text: It was alright probably  won't last long

resp.text: What do you mean? We have many compliments on our business whether it’s restaurant food or bar service.

name: Brittany Payne
text: Nice environment

resp.text: Superb 5 star rating. Absolutely very colorful decor and atmosphere. Appreciate your feedback.

name: D'Angelo Anderson
text: Great

resp.text: Thank you for your business. Appreciate you enjoyed your visit to the Jokers with Indian food.

name: Bernie Mettenberger
text: Finally, real Indian food in the Shoals. Tandoori Chicken was great. Margaritas were pretty good, but are the smallest I've seen.

resp.text: Great! Yes we are getting many new guests trying out Indian cuisine and others who have tried Indian food elsewhere before. Tandoor Chicken is cooked in a special Tandoor ( clay oven) with spices. This is a very popular appetizer dish. We have variety of beers including Kingfisher from India, domestic/ foreign and IPA beers, spirits, signature cocktails. Thank you for your patronage.

name: Josh Bell
text: The place has improved quite a bit recently. Before the boneless wings would be too crispy now they are much better and the sauce tastes a lot more fresh. Still a bit pricey but all in all improvements have been made

name: Cam Mackenzie
text: Terrible. Ordered appetizers that never came, but were delivered as sides instead. The order took forever to actually come out, and two people were missing orders. Drinks were never refilled, and at some point, we resulted to refilling our own, all while some five servers watched us do it. And still didn't refill our waters later until we asked. The food tasted bad. So bad. The chicken was cold and tasted not much unlike what I would imagine to be sweaty playground rubber chips. We normally go to the one in Jones Valley, which is great, but this one was far from it. I'm trying to put it into words, but all I can do is say it's the restaurant equivalent of a very warm and a very soggy salad. We were charged for food we didn't order. Meanwhile, the stool had maybe three tables of people and that's it. All the while, the wait staff stood at the front and talked.

name: S Lee
text: We traveled over an hour to shop in Huntsville only to end up waiting for food we never received for an hour. Out of all the food options in Huntsville we chose BWW and for that we blame ourself. NEVER again. This restaurant is representative of the deserted mall it is housed in. There were tons of servers doing nothing but waiting on the next patron to dart the door and none ever noticed we were not being served. We were two tables away from the host desk and the restaurant was not busy. After the extensive wait and seeing the cooks(I assume) look out the kitchen window, we hit the door. So frustrated we did not even shop. I guess everyone needs to experience the worst service ever and for us this was it! Unbelievable! How are they still in business?

name: ray ray whitty
text: Oh man. What a **Itty place. HORRIBLE SERVICE! I am not a complainer,  but this place had me pissed off. I watched 3 different tables of people leave before they even got their drinks. 30 mins later we get our drinks, and 45 minutes after that we get our room temp wings, with hardly any sauce on them. The waitresses looked greasy and disgusting. The manager was incompetent and full of excuses. I WILL NEVER GO BACK. EVER.

name: Tara McDonald
text: Took forever to get our food even though it wasn't busy. Service was unfriendly. And worst of all, they served my 2 yr old bad oranges. She described them as too spicy and they were! Nasty!Nas

name: Peter Gregg
text: Good bar food.  Lots of TVs.  You get what you expect which is a meal, a lively environment and some sports to watch.

name: Joey Kim
text: Been there when I didn't know better food was mediocre. Anti-gun. Won't go back unless they change policy.

name: Joshua Drew Bradford
text: Had great food. I have been several times and am never disappointed.

name: Travis Specht
text: Ignored the othr reviews, bad idea.  Ordered by phone, get there and the order is wrong (surprise considering the girl on the phone was super short and hungup right away when I was done ordering without repeating).  Waited an extra 10 minutes to get it fixed. I get home and they didn't include any of the sauces that were supposed to come with my sampler ap and there was no sauce on my sandwich.  Not like there was very little sauce, there was almost no sacue at all (the bun was even clean and dry).  Called back and the girl said she was back there when they made the sandwich and there was sauce on it but it must have come off while it was under the heat lamp.  She offered to put me down for a food credit but I'm not from huntsville so that's useless and even if I were why would I want credit for more crappy quality food? There were some solid employees (the femal assistant manager was really nice) but the bad quality control and the lazy employees make this the worst bww I've been to.  Waste of $30.

name: Jermel Carr
text: This is a franchise..so wings on Tuesday are more expensive than the company owned chain... $0.75 (is that a deal?). Asked for Tito's or Absolute and they did not have either (basic vodka?..took wings over 30 minutes to come out and asked for a beer at 11:30 when they close at 12..and they said the bar was shut off. 2 stars is being kind...this is the worst!!!!

name: Mary DeSpelder
text: Horrible. Had to seat ourselves. Waited for 15 mins without service, said something to the bartender still nothing 10 minutes later. Walked out without the wait staff even noticing. Don't waste your time. Rude and unprofessional.

name: Jerry Cleckler
text: If there was a zero star that is what they will get. Takes a long time to get food. It is getting worse.

name: Kumarappan Ganesh
text: they made us wait for a long time

name: Jonathan Mack
text: Small wings that weren't very warm the last time I went.

name: Billy Bryan
text: Don't waist your time. Corporate needs to conduct an evaluation on this store!

name: Matt Varian
text: Food was decent, service wasn't great however.

name: Kent Piatt
text:
Nice. Nice. Nice. VERY Nice!  A Birmingham landmark in the making!  We have Barbers Motorsport Park and now we have ICB.
Did I mention how nice it is?

name: Taylor Coleman
text: Great place to play pool and have a little bit to drink.  The pool tables are great and the workers are awesome.

name: Michael Smith
text: Great service great people & the diamond tables still look brand new. Well taken care of.

name: Tee Cole
text: It was great JP was a gracious host, however the carpet made me itch. But other than that i would most certainly go back, even their drink prices was reasonable

name: Kristine Turner
text: A players retreat. Best place in town to play pool. Good food too!

name: Richard Diamond
text: Been awhile since I have gone to a pool hall and this had very nice tables, staff very friendly,   overall fantastic.

name: Jamie Mccauley
text: Very Nice Pool room will be back the staff and atmosphere was awesome and great equipment all 💎 pool tables

name: Wes Layton
text: Great hall with attentive staff and plenty of tables - will be back!

name: Mrs. B
text: Nice tables, and plenty of them. 7 and 9ft. Diamonds

name: Alan Bethune
text: Awesome billiard hall. Tables and ball are top notch. Service is great too

name: Cammy Grede
text: This place is great. So accommodating.... Tons of tables.... Clean restrooms ... Great food and staff. Will continue to be a repeat customer!!!

name: Jamie “Jayme” Hass
text: Great place to share great times.

name: Anquan Huggins
text: Love this place APA YAY!!!

name: Jonathan Harris
text: World class pool hall, great food and people.

name: Leslie Dials
text: Fantastic tables and service awesome tournaments something going on every single night!

name: Freeman Grice
text: Great place to play pool on 7ft or 9 ft tables

name: April Thorpe
text: Huge place, fantastic diamond tables, friendly staff and amazingly affordable!

name: Brandon Vanslambroucc 8ck
text: Great venue, open late, and inexpensive drinks.

name: Angel Kemp
text: Great place for pool.... great bar tenders

name: Cathy Bishop Jones
text: This is a great place! The servers do such a great job!!!

name: Rodney Johnston
text: Great place for playing pool.  Good food and good service

name: Sandra Love
text: Wanted to order some food, no number on google

name: Walt Hunt
text: Good drink prices friendly staff.

name: Johnny Wester
text: They have plenty of tables top play on

name: Brandon Coon
text: Love this place

name: Johnny Davis
text: Practice social distance

name: Rusty Newton
text:
My wife and I ate here for a late dinner around 10:30pm. We were quickly seated by our friendly host and waitress Kim. We had a mudslide and the herbivore. Both arrived at the table promptly and the pizza was particularly impressive. Tons of toppings, very fresh and hot. The toppings were balanced and the thin crust was very crispy just like we wanted.

Overall only a positive experience with no complaints. Kim was good to us and when we come again we'll try to find her!

name: Joe Anderson
text: We were disappointed in the service we received during our last visit.  We ordered two pizzas.  Apparently there was an issue with one of the pizzas and it had to be re-made.  I appreciate that the staff corrected whatever the issue was.  However, they held the “good” pizza and when it came out it was cold.  The waitress recognized the issue without us saying anything and had that pizza replaced.  Again I appreciate that the staff took care of the second issue but we ended up having to wait an extreme amount of time for all us to be able to finish our meal.  Although both pizzas were good it took entirely too long for us to receive or order in a correct fashion.  Given the price and it taking multiple attempts to provide the correct product it was quite disappointing.

name: Andres Sulleiro
text: Good pizza. Italian sausage is crumbly, my preference, and not in big chunks like other places. Reminds me of many Midwestern joints. Standard dough is hand tossed, though more of a fork and knife kind of affair. Gluten free dough was excellent according to my wife who said "I'm a little concerned that it isn't actually gluten free it's so good!" Do not care for all the TV's in the place, as a family restaurant, everyone kept getting distracted instead of talking to each other. Solid place.

name: Brenda Cooper
text: Good pizza, I enjoy the food, prices are a little high but its worth it for a special treat for the kids.  We have had great service and the food is cooked in the amount of time you would think for a pizza so the wait is not bad.  This is probably my favorite pizza place in the Madison area...

name: myron cooper
text: We had 62 people and a nice simple setup. One appetizer table with two kinds of mussels and sliders. Beer and wine included - hard stuff extra. One antipasto table and they brought around some others stuff like crab balls and fried zucchini flowers. Special treat was pignoli cookies for dessert.

name: Robert Weeks
text: Cool looking place.  Comfortable atmosphere.   Breadsticks are the bomb.  Firecracker penne was excellent.   Alfredo sauce was bland but could have been an off day.  Apple stack dessert should be illegal!  Service, cleanliness,  10 out of 10.  Really good beer selection.   Ask for Matt.

name: Brian Gibson
text:
Great food and one of the few places in Huntsville / Madison with decent service. The only time we've had an issue with service, the waitress thought we were waiting on another person. She apologized multiple times and did a great job after that. Pretty good beer selection also. Decent placement of TV's so you can watch a lot of different sports but they are pretty high on the wall for viewing. However, a lot of people like to bring their kids there, so be aware it can get pretty loud.

Overall, one of our favorite places to eat.

name: Jayne Hopkins
text: Great service and wonderful pizza! I will go here again even though it was a longer than usual drive. Well worth it.

name: HK NoLabelxxCrew LGBTQ
text: The food is great and you can taste the freshness, but the wait was wayy too long ..I literally went to sleep and woke up and my food still wasn't there. Plus, it was freeezing cold in there. Next time, I'll definitely have to sit outside. The prices are reasonable also. Definitely a repeat restaurant choice.

name: James Liebbe
text: Good service for our party of 30. Calzone was delicious. Spinach salad was great.  Price was a little high.

name: Stephanie Friend
text: Decided, after a previous bad experience, giving them one more try. Needless to say, we were disappointed yet again. Waited about 10 mins for server. Although she was friendly and apologetic food took a while. We ordered wings and a salad. Both fell short of expectations. Left very upset to have spent the amount of money we did on the low quality.

name: William Aguaouz
text: Pizza was Great! Server was great only complaint was my drink wasn't that good but I'll definitely be back I'll just try a different drink

name: Colin White
text: Don't plan to eat here again. The food is really pricey and I don't find the taste to be any better than other local pizza places. The wait times are horrible for your food.

name: jessica barnes
text: Freaking awesome pizza. The spicy mexicali is the best. We drive from Florence just for the deliciousness.

name: James Branch
text: Great Pizza, good wings (boneless and bone-in). Service is hit or miss and prices are high. Will be back to try again.

name: David Cooper
text: Plenty of TVs , food moderately priced and good service

name: John Griffith
text: Great pizza & wings, good service, fair price.

name: Baylie Bacon
text: Worst service in my life. We ordered the focaccia and oil and herb dipping sauce as our appetizer, the bread was stale and the sauce wasn't your standard dipping oil, but oil and balsamic dressing? We ordered a large cheese pizza which was stated on the menu at $14.99, yet somehow our total was $34.00 (we had the appetizer removed from our total). When we asked how our total could be so high, she explained that our extra cheese and basil toppings somehow costed over $10? Our server never checked on us and when we asked questions she seemed annoyed and was very unhelpful. Definitely will not be returning. Wouldn't ever reccomend to anyone.

name: Eric Ibarra
text: If you want both pizza and craft beer then this is the place to go. They have a large selection of both pizza and beer, which are both good.

name: Jeremy Abbott
text: The service is horrible. After 20 minutes of no one even taking our drink order we left. I could understand if the place was busy, but there were only 3 others there.

name: Stephen Trumbull
text: Nice place. Tasty food and great revolving beer selection.

name: Manwe Elder
text:
There's a reason the people who work here come and go. My suspicion is that what plagues this place is something persistent throughout the entire establishment, the diseased service and hit-and-miss food being no mere coincidence.

I pity not only those unfortunate souls who have had to be subject to perhaps one of the worst dining experiences possible but also the workers themselves, who while contributing to the unpleasant atmosphere, very likely are only unpleasant because of a major flaw in management somehwere high up.

My family and I have devised a game in which we bet on what odd creation our simple spiral breadstick, which we have periodically ordered on our rare visits to Pie In the Sky, will be each time around. Everytime we are surprised with something new.

Why do we still go every couple of months despite the awareness that the service and good will likely suck major donkey piss? Because Pie In the Sky has the potential to serve out awesome tasting food. The sad thing is that bad management and simple carelessness make such an occurence an outlier among the general spread of crappy visits. It has likely gotten to the point that we'll just not go anymore, whatever faint hope we had having been demolished by the consequetive iniquities of Pie In the Sky.

name: Ross Cherry
text: $12 kids pizza? Ok maybe if the pizza was that good then i could live with that but Ive had better pizza from a gas station...very dissapointed not worth the money and you can get better quality from Dominos

name: Joe McIntosh
text: Great food, friendly service, and excellent beer selection.

name: Matt Bynum
text: Best pizza west of Huntsville. Try the Baja Chicken!

name: Jason Moore
text: Service was non-existent.  We sat at the table for 10 minutes wondering if anyone was working.  There was no one on duty when we walked in on a Saturday at 1pm.  There was a group of 15 cheerleaders up front who waited for 25 minutes before finally seating themselves.  After looking at the menu, I'm guessing it is run-of-the-mill Mall Sprawl food.  We went to Sam & Greggs where someone says "Hello..." when you walk in the door.

name: Ryan Lavender
text: Perfect food and location. Wish there were more of these restaurants around.

name: Mikey P
text: Awesome atmosphere and great selection!

name: Jonathan Mack
text: Not a great value

name: Kevin Pulliam
text: Great beer, above average calzones

name: Justin Grissim
text: Sat for 20 minutes and never even got water. We left

name: Christine Chaloupka
text: Parker was excellent! !!!

name: Tiffany F
text: Cool

name: Matt Riales
text: Honestly very good! They gave my wife a Mother's Day glass the second we got to the table. She loves it! My only complaint is my burger and I believe that was my fault with the way I ordered it, so I did not say anything. Not their fault. The draft beer that was suggested by our server was amazing! We will definitely be back for more, with a little more experience!

name: KIA HUNTER
text: My order was completely thrown together. I specified in my online order, condiments on the side, for my burger, and I asked for sautéed onions. My burger came with neither on it, or on the side. My burger was lukewarm almost cold and dry. My fries were soggy and lukewarm. I placed my order in the parking lot of the restaurant, at 8:32 p.m. I checked into curbside pickup around 8:45 after I received the text message from the restaurant saying that I could check in. There was no reason for my food to be lukewarm almost cold. I am highly dissatisfied and disappointed in the service I received. The staff for that shift literally just threw together an order. I have never received service like this from you all before.

name: Carly Stuart
text: The food truly was great! And everyone seemed to check on us while we were eating. Our waitress, the manager and even the chef came out to see how everything was. Very friendly staff. The only complaint I have is my chili came out and wasn't very hot, but it was still delicious and I ate all of it because it was that good! My boyfriends food came out and wasn't that hot either, but my pizza came out fresh! Overall, it was still a great experience and the food all tasted amazing.

name: Jamila Shabazz
text:
The customer service was good. Very busy in there. Our waiter was very busy. They forgot to bring our food to us. It took them less than 15 mins to give us our beverages. Food was salty. I had cheese broccoli (salty) Mediterranean taco (salty)
Our entrees came out cold. House salad with ranch was salty. When a person that wasn’t our waiter brought us the salad, he didn’t think to give us a utensils. We didn’t have utensils when we got to the table. My family personally will not be going back pass 8pm; we might give them another chance around lunch time. The atmosphere was pleasant, that’s what we enjoyed the most. It look like they were under staff. Our waiter was gone for so long after she gave us our appetizers & we needed refills. We had to go to the bar for a refill. The supervisor was shocked that we got up to get our own beverages.

name: Tommye Cauthen
text: Excellent food somehow getting our menus. The manager was very curious and helpful. The seared tuna was fantastic

name: LaTonya Garrett
text: Food was great. Dessert was delicious.  Customer service was excellent as well. Family friendly or can go and hang out and watch sports.

name: Sandra Nunya
text: Food was good, service was amazing. This was a whole package of a great lunch with mother, daughter and two granddaughters. Vegan selections are amazing. Very child friendly.

name: Brianna Valerius
text: Server was okay. My husbands soup came out lukewarm with his dinner. My soup was 15-20 minutes after my dinner came out. Their bison burger (which I take leave to doubt is actual bison having had it in many occasions and if it is, then it has at some time been frozen and the flavor is subpar) was 1/2 inch smaller than the bun all around so for the first 2-3 bites in all directions it was just bread. They put two skinny / skimpy onions on my burger and the singular piece of lettuce was wilted. My server did remedy the situation for us. The bartender gave my husband sass with an eye roll when he asked for a Manhattan which was served in a martini glass? While the choice of glass is odd, that isn’t a big deal, forgetting the bitters is though. My husband did enjoy his $27 steak, it was well cooked and large. Overall this place was a bit of a let down. We were disappointed with the food, timing of the food, and attitude of the bartender. Not a terrible place by any means, but there are just so many better options and ways to spend your money.

name: Kim Gebauer
text: I ordered the classic pizza, had it delivered.   It was rock hard, cold, completely overcooked.  There was almost no sauce and very little cheese. Too many herbs as well. It was literally the worst pizza I’ve ever had. Ive had other food there that was good so this was very disappointing

name: Janna Rolfe
text: We had a great lunch here.  Their berry cider was fabulous.  We also enjoyed our appetizer and meals.  The cheese curbs were delicious and were as good as ones in Wisconsin.  The chicken sandwich and bison burger and salad were all delicious.  The service was great and place felt clean and safe

name: Starrdom100 Radio
text: This has become a new favorite spot! My favorite happens to be the wings with the Root Beer sauce!!! I also love the fried Wisconsin cheese curds!

name: Andy Huber
text: I've been here twice now and had a good experience both times. Once at lunch with good food suggestions from the waitress and once at the end of my day for drinks. The waiter let me sample a few flavors of their house beer and was  regularly making sure nothing else was needed. Fair price, good food, good drinks!

name: Katlyn Campbell
text: Absolutely at a loss for words at how amazing this establishment is. The atmosphere, the employees, the wait time, THE FOOD!! Would definitely without any hesitation recommend this place to anyone looking for an excellent dining experience.

name: Kristin Fountain
text: First time trying BJ's and it's the first time, in a long time, I have been impressed with a restaurant in Mobile. Everything was so delicious and flavorful and the family meal was so convenient. Finally,  a restaurant actually worth going to. We will be back soon!

name: Cory Sprouse
text: Ordered the Brussel sprouts and kale salad for pick up. Got it home, no Brussel sprouts.  I thought ok, not a problem since I ordered avocado on the side. When I opened up the container for the avocado there was not even a quarter of an avocado cut up in the container. Not worth it and the most disappointing experience and a waste of money.

name: Nina Grandison
text: My experience was not great went on a Sunday ordered a pork chop was told my companion ordered the last one. Later waitress come back to table and companion was told there wasn't any pork chops left. Another companion ordered an appetizer and salad they didn't receive it till after their  entree after informing the waitress. Refills filled only after informing waitress they were needed. Not a busy day but service was awful.

name: Bryan Holder
text: Menu is quite large and diverse. Prices are what I consider too expensive for what you get. They would do better reducing their menus size and focusing to keep dishes.

name: neal moore
text:
The food was good and at first the service was good as well. Between my entree my drinks and my dessert me a solo diner spent $50 in tipped 20% accordingly.

I signed my checks before I had finished my dessert and had hoped on another glass of water before I left. I ended up sitting and waiting 10 or 15 minutes looking around for a server just to get another glass of water before I left. My server was unfindable.  Funny enough their table would have been cleared in probably three or four minutes as the only reason I was staying was I wanted another glass of water and had planned on drinking it and then leaving.

Probably not going to stop back in when I come back.

name: Pat Richard
text: The food was good.  Our waiter was delightful.  Nice and clean restaurant.

name: Jade
text: I got the baked ziti and ordered a side Cesar salad, both were good. Social distancing was in place very well, even though we were a party of 9 we were separated in the same section. The menu was online and had to be scanned by QR code to get to it. Our server was great , and checked in frequently while trying to check all her other tables and kept our drinks filled. Overall it was a nice experience given the circumstances.

name: Jacqueline Trenier
text: Absolutely love this place! I've been coming here with friends for a few years now and the food and customer service are amazing. Shout out to Austin! He's amazing!

name: Tabby Mac4
text: I've tried just about everything on the menu. The food here is really great!

name: Devin Blakely
text: The kitchen at the Mobile, AL location has no pride in presentation or preparation of food. I have patronized this location over the years and I have had the same mediocre food each time so common sense would say stop spending my money there. So this will be the last time. Several items we ordered came out cold, over cooked or horribly presented which made you not even want to eat it. Management did nothing but gave excuses on top of lazy apologies for the few times he himself had to come back to bring us food that was prepared wrong. Money was not an issue but being in management myself there would have been no way I would have made a customer pay for ANY of the horrible food that came out of that kitchen. This has to be Bj's standard because there is no way over the years that I can receive the same mediocre service and bad food EVERY TIME I come. The kitchen manager and GM should be ashamed. And if you thought the customer service that you provided was acceptable you were mistaken.

name: Josue Roman
text: Ask for Ashley, extraordinary service!  Thank you!  The best service you can have.  As for the food, super delicious.  You must try the spaghetti and meatballs;  I loved!  It is the first time that I go and I really liked the place.  Super clean and clean bathrooms.  If you have not gone this is a place which you should not stop going and more if you like to spend it with your family.  A cozy place, an extensive bar and the perfect music.  What did I not like?  that I left on the table the food I had to take home 😭😭😭Lol.

name: Sam morris
text: BJ's was wonderful... I've never been to a restaurant that had such great service so quickly. Cybreena was especially wonderful behind the bar.  thank you so much. Keep up the good work. The other restaurants in the Mobile area should come and observe your service and they could learn a lot

name: Leigh Davis
text: Great food, atmosphere,  and great service. Bartender was phenomenal. Highly recommend.

name: David Seward
text: Great service, great beer,  great food, just a bit pricey

name: Stacey Steiner
text: Didn't go there. Was next door at Jason's Deli. It was fantastic. They have reopened their salad bar which is the best salad bar I have ever seen and it was great.

name: Morgan Black
text: Pretty good place. Food is good, and it has a comfortable atmosphere.  The wait staff is always been quick and friendly.  If you haven't tried the salted caramel cookie thing you are missing out!

name: Robert Helvey
text: I went there to get something to eat. The hostess said  I could sit anywhere in the bar area, since it was only me. I sat at a table, since that was the only space available. The manager came over and told me I had to leave that that table was reserved for guest seated by the hostess. I told him the hostesses said to sit there and he told me I couldn’t. He was very rude about it so I left. I didn’t even get a chance to order anything, I can’t review the food but the manager was rude.

resp.text:
Robert,

I wanted to apologize for the miscommunication that was had at our restaurant this past Friday evening. I wanted to clarify that you were not asked to leave, but were asked to move to the actual bar or if you would have liked, we could have sat you in the dining room. Again, I apologize for the miscommunication. Furthermore, we will be working with our team to ensure all guests are sat in a timely manner and that we are clear with our guests on how our bar/cocktail seating works. Please reach out to me with any questions at dearnest@bjsrestaurants.com.

Sincerely,

David Earnest
General Manager

name: William Bradley
text: Great pizza and huge beer selection. Monday night is half off their pizzas. Our server, Christopher, was outstanding.

name: C C
text: All about the Tri-tip Nachos! Loaded up and delicious 🤤. Friendly staff and knowledgeable about the big menu.

name: Halie White
text: Best food I've had in a long time must try the mango porkchops so delicious

name: robert stechyn
text: Very nice atmosphere, Bartender very ambitious as well the food was great.

name: Hannah Chapman
text: About two days ago I got the worst food poisoning I have ever had from eating about half of a side salad. I am still ill and haven't been able to eat. I'm just blown away that not even half of a SIDE salad did this. I hope they start taking better precautions.

name: Steven S
text: Keep in mind we came in 15 minutes before the kitchen was closing. But food should be just as good at the end of the night as it is at the beginning. Ribeye was awesome.  Cooked perfectly.  Fish and chips was cooked in old grease. But fish still had decent crisp and flavor. Enlightened Asian chicken was decent. Chicken was tender. Roasted Brussels were tough and not so flavorful. The atmosphere and cleanliness was awesome.  We will be back , just maybe earlier in the evening. Will definitely try some of the craft beers next time.

name: Scott Woodcock
text: Cleaned our own table and sat for 20 mins without drinks at 4pm on March 9th 2021. Watched our waiter sit and chat with friends until we decided to find a more attentive place to eat.

name: Pamela The Islandgirl
text: Wow! What a tasty meal we had. Price was a good value..and we loved, just loved taking home an extra meal for just $6.00. We shared an appetizer, had 2 entrees, a lovely yummy salad and dessert plus took 2 meals home for much less than usual. Can highly recommend- service was attentive and ambiance really cool! Will return for sure!!

name: Michelle Crenshaw
text: Jocelyn was very helpful and if you get a chance to sit in her section you should. The beer was good and the food was fantastic. I had tri-tip power bowl, so good. Will be going back.

name: George Spragg
text: Best prime rib I have ever had. Make sure and have the brownie pizookie.

name: CHARLES TAYLOR
text: Came in at 2 PM.  Taken to a booth.  No one waited on us.  Other customers who were seated after us were waited on.  Waiter and hostess saw us but ignored us.  After 15 minutes we left.

name: Michael Strayer
text:
It's a national chain, but this was my first time eating here. So a review.

Tonight was only the second official day the place has been open. Lots of friendly staff and trainers. Great open restaurant with nice bar and tons of craft beer on tap. Enormous menu. Plenty of tv's to watch a game.

Told the bartender I liked amber lager beer, so she brought me the house amber. Really nice beer with great flavor.

Ordered some wings with extra hot buffalo sauce and ranch dressing. Very tasty, sauce was hot but not too hot.

Overall, if I wanted some bar food or even some pizza or pasta...I would not hesitate to come back. Great place.

name: Jamie Jackson
text: BJs is great. The food is great, they have tons of beer on tap, and Caroline behind the bar is awesome. We went twice in one week. Great food, great customer service. We will definitely be back.

name: Rhonda Guitroz
text: The service was slow eventhoug the restaurant was empty, and the waitress couldn't seem to get the order right.

name: Tamara Berry
text: Very tasty Entrées. Our server, Stormy Lee, for a party of 9 & a toddler makes 10 was excellent to say the least!

name: Samantha Roberson
text: Both the tri tip and ribeye we ordered were severely overcooked. The chicken looked and tasted like it came out of the microwave. The cauliflower was undercooked to the point it was almost raw and tasted awful on top of that. The asparagus and the ribeye were so spicy it was inedible even if it was cooked correctly. The only reason it's getting two stars is because our waiter was exceptionally amazing and took care of us so well.

name: Parth Patel
text: Very nice restaurant from inside. The interior is very well maintained. They have a bar which looks really cool compared to other restaurants I go to. The service they gave was real nice and the food served was fast. The food was not great, not that it was bad. The food was decent, could be better.

name: Catrina Stevenson
text: Can I just say Amazing!!! The food selection is huge. So it's great for several people to go because there is something for everyone. The Brew list is fantastic!! Lots and lots of options. The staff are very attentive and friendly!! The birthday cookie is so delicious!!

name: P. T.
text: This restaraunt was one ok. However, I have left the last three times because the hostess makes me feel like I have been discriminated against. Today I was told the wait would be 35 to 45 minutes but there were vacant tables everywhere. We left and drove to another similar restaraunt who actually had more tables filled and were seated right away.

resp.text:
P.T.,

I want to apologize for not having seated you right away. Discrimination by any means will not be tolerated. Please reach out to me at dearnest@bjsrestaurants.com so I can get some more information regarding this incident. We would like to rectify the situation and ensure you and your guests can enjoy our restaurant at any time.

Sincerely,

David Earnest
General Manager

name: Tisha Doakes
text: Food was good I tried something different, healthy. it was a good choice very satisfied 😋 Nice atmosphere

name: Chip Hearn
text: We had a party of 4.  We all enjoyed our meal!  Would eat there again if we ever stop in Mobile again!

name: G L
text:
Sitting at a table I intensely dislike. Supposedly the only one available, even so many more people were seated right after us.
Chicken Pot Stickers cold, tough and tasteless.
Spicy Chicken with Soba Noodles,  greasy and luke warm, drowned in peanut sauce.  BRUSSELS Sprouts cold, looking like dried grass, fried, no seasoning. No Sriracha Crema. My husband enjoyed his hamburger. Beside that,  Worst meal we had here.
Our Waitress, Sabre, was friendly and attentive. The Manager waved at us once. Tried to get his attention to tell him above. However, whenever he passed, he ignored us. We did not want anything comped. Just giving feedback. I was a professional Chef, now retired. We should have left before being seated close to the entrance at a corner where everyone swept past. It will not happen again. We usually stop at BJ's whenever we have to go to Mobile. We will wait a while before we return.

resp.text:
Mrs. Landau,

This is concerning and we want to make this right. I would like to apologize for the experience yesterday and for not being the one to come over and ensure everything was up to par. Obviously, this was not the case. There is no excuse for being seated a table you intensley disliked. Also, there is no reason why the food should have been tasteless or overdone.  Please contact me via email at dearnest@bjsrestaurants.com so I can get some more information from you so that we can better coach our team to ensure a better dining experience. You can also reach out to me at the restaurant 251-581-9240. Thank you for your feedback and I look forward to speaking with you soon.

Sincerely,

David Earnest
General Manager

name: charles anderson
text: First and last time coming here. Lost my business over this covid b.s. If they were worried about masks, they should have stayed closed! Air conditioning circulates air so what is the point of wearing a mask to walk around just to take it off to eat? That is kinda stupid if you ask me. Never heard of some silly stuff like this.

name: Ultreya Park
text: Dining companion noted how long it took the waitress to arrive after a hassle about an appropriate seating place. Love the roasted brussel sprouts and the art. Kinda overpriced for what you get. VERY salty. Hostess needs more training, to allow customers in wheelchairs to sit where they need to sit. Many of the square tables have a large chunky round center pedestal, which disallow getting under the table very far, and when I pointed this out, she did not seem too concerned, so I had to ask for another table and I remembered being seated at a certain table previously. I mentioned that. She was reluctant. I nudged. We went in that direction and I pointed out the ideal table. She offered a booth with a post at the end and I pointed out the problem, and declined. I again pointed to the table that would work, and she said that section has been cleaned and I said I see that, but...Would you like me to clear it with a manager? So she offered the table beside it, same section, because it was smaller, for our party of two. The larger table did not have a center round pedestal. I gave in, because by this time it was feeling like an argument, making my dining companion uncomfortable, and the table offered was better than the first of the three. See photos for specifics on food and space. Atmosphere gets 5 stars.

name: Ahmed Nasser
text: Took an hour and half to 5 pazookies, wasn’t even busy. And then they only gave me 4. Come here if you like being treated as a nuisance. Also the pazookie could have been have been sold as a cracker and no one would have noticed.

name: Rhiannon Sweatt
text: It was fantastic and the bartender Joel was excellent and attentive to us and the other customers around us!

name: Jennifer Davis
text: I just went to met my boyfriend who is a UPS driver, working until 10:30-11 every night for dinner and they refused to seat me until he was there. I explained to them that he only has a hour for his “lunch” and I wanted to get a table and place his drink order before he got there and they told me I wasn’t allowed to have a table until he arrived. I was beyond disappointed to see the kind of customer service they showed THEIR own UPS driver during the holidays. Unlike them, he doesn’t get to clock out at 9 pm and go home to his family!  Horrible experience and we will not be back!  BTW.. they’re were only 4-5 tables in the bar area being used!  They obviously need the business and yet turned us away!

resp.text:
Jennifer,

I wanted to apologize for the terrible experience you had with us yesterday. There is absolutely no excuse on why we wouldn't be able to seat you so you could wait for your boyfriend to join you. I'm extremely sorry that this happened and would love to talk with you and make it right. Please reach out to me at dearnest@bjsrestaurants.com or call me at the restaurant at 251-581-9240. I will be speaking with all of our hosts today to ensure they know how to properly seat our guests. Please reach out to me at your convenience. I look forward to hearing from you.

Sincerely,

David Earnest
General Manager
BJ's Mobile, AL

name: Marshall OHern
text: Good food and service.  A large selection of menu items.

name: AL Jefferson
text: Food is always amazing. However, your website said half off pizza Monday’s automatically deducts the promo code at checkout. But the price stays the same. Please get this glitch fixed.

name: Aidan Screws
text: Bad service, long wait despite having a reservation, rude manager, and mediocre food. Do not recommend

name: Nedra Irby
text: Wasn't happy with my food .the steak bloody and bake potato was cool.shrimps was cooked all the way.

name: Paul LePiane
text: Everything was good our server was very nice and attentive.

name: Juan Hernandez
text: Brisket bacon burger is very delicious paired with their own tasty IPA... perfect!!

name: Jasmine Grim
text: Nice atmosphere, and my waitress Missy was lovely, attentive and quick.  I ordered the blood orange pom sangria, was very delicious but heads up it has a very strong cinnamon flavor. The fried artichoke hearts were delicious, the batter was perfect and they were juicy. Lastly I got the enlightened Pacific poke with buckwheat noodles, the flavors were great, you could taste the wasabi but it was not overpowering, my only critique is I wish the buckwheat noodles were a little chewy as they are traditionally served, but still very much enjoyed the dish.

name: Marg Fields
text:
We had an office holiday lunch here Tuesday. The food was amazing! Service was phenomenal! Two waitresses took care of 40+ individuals with excellence 👍🏼😊

I can’t wait for our next trip here!  Love this restaurant 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼😊

name: Terry Covas
text: My family and I had a terrible experience with this particular location. We were seated immediately after entering the restaurant. We waited twenty minutes for someone to take our drink order(at this point we should have left). Drinks arrived quickly. We placed our food order and waited thirty five minutes for, a burger, two fish tacos, mini corn dogs, chicken Alfredo and chicken tenders. When the food arrived they forgot to cook the tenders. So as I sat patiently across from my daughter who had not received her food I realized that everyone's beverages were empty, we never receiveda refill until the tenders arrived. We finally received ALL our food 46 min after placing our order. Food was not that great. All this would have been understandable if they were busy, but the place was practically empty. We will not be dinning at this location again.

name: Justin Kline
text:
Food is ok but they do have a big selection, which is nice. Pizzas are the best thing on the menu besides the Avocado Egg Rolls. They do have really solid drinks so I would choose this place for drinks first.

The Mobile Pay/Menu, option is very convenient. Get the app, it's definitely worth it if you plan to come regularly.

name: Terry Collette
text: This is in the Old Cheddars building. 100% improvement. Very nice open dining area. Menu was huge. Food was particularly good. Great addition to the area.

name: Sedra D
text: The gluten free pepperoni extreme was good

name: jan vickers
text: BJ'S is great! The food is awesome and our waitress was so sweet! Wasn't really thrilled with needing to scan the table to see the menu,  but I'm old school and like to see it on paper 👍

name: rjacpapbcrun
text: Ask for Joel. One of the best yet

name: Shelley Griffin
text: Our food was very good. The waiter was fabulous.

name: Aisha Lyle
text: The service at this place is always wishy washy and lately it’s just been horrible. I called to place a to-go order and someone told me the kitchen closed at 10:30, which is crazy because i’ve ordered later than that. My friend called two seconds later and another lady took our order no problem. The food is good but some of their employees are questionable.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know about the service issue. I am so sorry about this! We would love to connect with you. Please give us a call at the restaurant so we can make this right for you and learn more.

name: Logan Smith
text: This is a unique bar and grill they serve everything you desire, from salad to Wong's to burgers. They will satisfy every taste bud in your mouth. Once you take on Vite of their tasty food you'll never want to leave. My personal favorite from Bj's is the Parmesan garlic boneless wings. Come to Bj's you won't regret it.

name: Amber Pond
text: Food and beers were both great. Well prepared. The ribs were tneder, steak was cooked to order correctly, and all veggies were fresh. ill go back.

name: makenzie mh
text: The atmosphere is very nice and it seems very elegant but that's about where it stops. Our waitress was annoyed and got attitude when we asked for a refill or salt and pepper, not to mention when we needed to go boxes. The food was over priced. For example their chicken alfredo is very bland and honestly you can make the same at home but are charging like $15 for it. While it is a big portion it didn't taste good. Our silverware wasn't clean as well. While there are always spots that you just can't get off, there was actual left over food on the forks...

name: Tim Simmons
text: Great food, kinda expensive but was a good experience.

name: Seth Shipley
text:
Rough meal, I would recommend looking for other options.  Out of deep dish large pizzas (Monday’s 1/2 off special) well before closing (though offered half off a small after I inquired).  Small deep dish pizza came out with soggy, spongy crust and lukewarm (as the last item delivered).  Ribs had good flavor, but also lukewarm with a baked potato seriously undercooked.  Tortilla soup came out closer to gelatin than soup (barely warm), though I appreciated that our waitress took the soup off our bill based on our feedback.

Staff was cordial, but perfunctory.  Didn’t want to seat us at booth due to a “rotation”, and it makes me wonder if our food quality suffered because we were “difficult” in our seating request.  Hope this was just an off night, but after multiple poor BJs Restaurant experiences, I’ll be steering clear for the foreseeable future.

name: Jerri Ledford
text: Bj's has great craft beer (most of the time)! But if you're expecting consistent food preparation, this may not be the right place. I ordered a steak, medium rare. It came out medium and the salad came out after the meal. Of course, the pizookies are always spot on and if you want fast seating, you can always go to the bar.

name: Andrew Christensen
text: Great food (overpriced), solid beer, decent atmosphere, but shoddy service. Mandy seemed pleasant but didn’t seem to know her stuff very well. Later on, we were clearly done eating but she ignored us for a solid 30 minutes. She claimed we were watching the football game and didn’t want to disturb us. We were only watching because we were bored waiting on her to bring us the check.

name: JO
text: They have a wide array of items on the menu. It's good food.

name: Ashley Hitt
text: I got made like I wasn't a inconvenience due to my size.

name: Charles Jones
text: Great service, tasty food. Ashley at the bar went above and beyond on a Thursday night.

name: Ricardo Coleman
text: Great service and great food, I will be coming back

name: Nathan Brown
text: Beers were great, food was cooked perfectly and very delicious. Our server Haley was great and after having some battery troubles in the parking lot, Lambert came and assisted. Super kind people at this place.

name: Jason Holton
text: Was recommended by family and visited today. Was definitely disappointed with the food and service. $26 ribeye no taste, was not even offered steak sauce, which in this case it needed. Steak like this should have a WOW about it but not there. Baked potato no butter, sour cream, salt or pepper. Salad just plain with maybe a teaspoon of dressing. No rolls, bread or crackers. Had sweet tea not offered a refill. Never asked how is your meal taste or prepared. Have had better food and service at fast food for a third of the price. Disappointing

name: Aaron Moore
text: The food is amazing and the services was spot on!

name: Rodney Moody
text: Busy but good. A little loud but it's just part of the scene. Get over it. I will be back.

name: Lesley Gunn
text: Waitress wasn't on her job too slow and food was nasty...

name: David Martinez
text: Food was great but service from bartender was poor. He said he "wants to go home" so we have to leave.

resp.text: Oh no! I am so sorry! This is not what we want to hear. We would love to connect with you. Please give us a call at the restaurant so we can make it right.

name: Lady V0516
text: Food was good.   Service was excellent.   Restaurant is making sure to keep to social distancing standards and servers are wearing masks.

name: TC Gurus
text: Great selection of craft beers. Pizza was surprisingly good... very good in fact. I like the atmosphere. Great happy hour specials.

name: Josephine Maddox
text: Every thing was unacceptable my family an I will not return ever

name: Summer King
text: Seriously delicious fries! Great burgers. Tasty apps, with a wide variety beyond the usual. Really really good! We'll be back Monday night for their pizza Special!

name: Tys Greene
text: Awesome place to eat. Mandy, our waitress, took excellent care of us. (Thank you, Mandy)Sampled 4 different beers, to start off. Ordered their homemade guacamole, with homemade desserts chips.
